page.title: 09HULLAND C.E. SCHOOL
page.content: {Hulland C.E. School}is in the centre of{Hulland Ward.}It was built in 1984 so it is over a year old. There are 20 people who help in the school, five teachers, one headmaster, two cleaning ladies, five dinnerladies, one cook and three kitchen assistants and three ancillaries who help the teachers and headmaster. There are{one hundred and {twenty-eight children}in the{school. The people who supply the school with the books, pens etc.are E.J.Arnold from Leeds, Hestair Hope from Oldham, Studio-Craft from Abbots Bromley and Dryad from Leicester. The people who supply the food are Greengrocers from Matlock, butchers from Bakewell,Frozen Foods from Merchants in Stoke-on-Trent and a Grocer from Nottingham.
